even if his honour should be the price.

They gave me good service, or so I thought,
but it seems it was all an act.

quotes.text: I'm sorry to disappoint you,

quotes.text: And that is how fate has answeredâ€¦

quotes.text: But not one of them decayed when faced with the scarlet rot...

quotes.text: Festering with rot, and crippled by madness, all he wanted was an honourable death.

quotes.text: May we meet again, if the fates deign it. Brave champion.

quotes.text: May we meet again, if the fates deign it. Brave champion.

quotes.text: Brave warrior, if the fates deign it...

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_312063010 leans on Primeval Current across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: If the fates deign it, may we meet again, Tarnished.

quotes.text: I vow this time to crush both your frame and your primal glintstone.

quotes.text: I am Rya, in the service of Lady Tanith of the Volcano Manor.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_313010030 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Well. Nice to see you again.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_314020010 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: That unfortunate incident was a cruel twist of fate indeed.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_314021100 leans on Primeval Current across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Lanya knows this, I'm certain. Fate has laid hard roads for us both.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_314021120 leans on Primeval Current across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: It's just as my noble brother says.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_314031000 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text:
Left the Volcano Manor. Forging my own path now.
Making my own choices.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_314041030 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Ahh, a yen for glintstone sorceries?

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316002000 leans on Glintstone & Crystalline across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Very well. You are now my protÃ©gÃ© in glintstone sorcery.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316003010 leans on Glintstone & Crystalline and Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Anticipate grievances, young apprentice.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316003030 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Young apprentice. First things first.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316010000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: There you are, my apprentice.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316011000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Our art draws upon the powers embedded in glintstone.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316020000 leans on Glintstone & Crystalline across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Glintstone is the amber of the cosmos.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316020020 leans on Sap & Flow and Glintstone & Crystalline across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Golden amber contains the remnants of ancient life, and houses its vitality,

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316020030 leans on Sap & Flow across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: while glintstone contains residual life, and thus the vitality of the stars.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316020040 leans on Glintstone & Crystalline across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: that glintstone sorcery is the study of the stars, and the life therein.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316020060 leans on Glintstone & Crystalline across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Seluvis is not a name I ever wanted to hear again...

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316031010 leans on Trickster & Mask across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: But, fine. If it will help you, my apprentice, I offer my knowledge.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316031020 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: The stars alter the fate of the Carian royal family. And the fate of your mistress, Ranni.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316031030 leans on Primeval Current across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: But long ago, General Radahn challenged the swirling constellations, and in a crushing victory, arrested their cycles.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316031040 leans on Rebirth & Cycles across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: My apprentice, what happened to your nail?

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316040000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: A wise choice. Let me neutralize it.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316041000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: This is the beloved apprentice of Sellen, Graven Witch.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316041050 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: What's this sorcery, my apprentice?

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316050000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Master Azur was a founding glintstone sorcerer, and my first teacher.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316050020 leans on Glintstone & Crystalline across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: We can speak more later, my apprentice.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316050050 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: It was for attempting to restore the primeval current of glintstone sorcery.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316060010 leans on Glintstone & Crystalline and Primeval Current across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: The toothless pedantry peddled by the Carian royal family can rot for all I care.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316060020 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I want glintstone sorceries that open our minds, unbound by terrestrial taboos.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316060030 leans on Glintstone & Crystalline across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: My apprentice. I presume nothing.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316060050 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: But hear me out, my apprentice.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316060070 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I need your help to restore the primeval current of glintstone sorcery.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316060080 leans on Glintstone & Crystalline and Primeval Current across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Perhaps this is a journey we could take together?

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316060090 leans on Pilgrim & Journey across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Don't give it another thought, my apprentice.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316062020 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Really? My apprentice.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316063000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: There you are, my apprentice.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316064000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I need your help, my apprentice.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316070000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Master Lusat is another founding glintstone sorcerer.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316070010 leans on Glintstone & Crystalline across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: My apprentice, can you find Master Lusat?

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316070030 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: With this glintstone key, you should be able to cross the boundary that encloses him.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316070040 leans on Glintstone & Crystalline across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I need him to restore the primeval current of glintstone sorcery.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316071000 leans on Glintstone & Crystalline and Primeval Current across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Thinking about it, I obtained the glintstone key I gave you from a Sellian sorcerer.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316072020 leans on Glintstone & Crystalline across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I am truly pleased to have you as an apprentice, and a kindred spirit.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316080020 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: My apprentice. Give me a moment later.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316090000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Can you make the journey to my body?

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316090060 leans on Pilgrim & Journey across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Can you make the journey to my body?

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316092020 leans on Pilgrim & Journey across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: My apprentice, thank you for coming.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316100000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: My primal glintstone.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316100030 leans on Glintstone & Crystalline across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Thank you...my apprentice...

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316103020 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: ...and yet you persist, you frothing degenerates...

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316104040 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Treat it with care, my apprentice...

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316105000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: My apprentice, just how long has it been?

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316110000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: And it's truly a gem. Young and full of vigor, a snug fit for my Primal Glintstone.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316110020 leans on Glintstone & Crystalline across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: To expel the Carian royal family, and restore the primeval current.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316110050 leans on Glintstone & Crystalline and Primeval Current across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: My dear apprentice, I owe this all to you.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316110060 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: To expel the Carian royal family, and restore the primeval current.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316111010 leans on Glintstone & Crystalline and Primeval Current across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: My apprentice, shall we commence the lesson?

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316112000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Ahh, my apprentice.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316120000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: With the bodies of Masters Azur and Lusat returned, the academy can hone the primeval current.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316120030 leans on Glintstone & Crystalline and Primeval Current across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: My apprentice. Will you stay with us, here at the academy?

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316120050 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: My apprentice. Become Elden Lord.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316120130 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: That glintstone is the amber of the cosmos, and sorcery is the study of the stars, and the life therein.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316122010 leans on Sap & Flow and Glintstone & Crystalline across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: What is it? My apprentice.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316125000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Ahh, I am glad to see you. My apprentice.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316126000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: His body is needed. At the academy, to hone the primeval current...

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316127020 leans on Glintstone & Crystalline and Primeval Current across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: And when the bodies of Masters Azur and Lusat are together, the academy can hone the primeval current.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316128020 leans on Glintstone & Crystalline and Primeval Current across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: What a joy to have you as an apprentice, and kindred spirit.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316128050 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: With the body of Master Azur returned, the academy can restore the primeval current.

quotes.text: M-my...apprentice...

quotes.text: My...apprentice...

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316141000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Never lose that inquisitive spirit, my apprentice.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316150030 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: You sadden me, my apprentice.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316807000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: My apprentice...

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_316809010 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Perhaps we will meet again, if fate permits.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_318016010 leans on Primeval Current across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: The strength of a mighty dragon. Magnificent, but deadly.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_318031040 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: That Bloody Finger was a thorn in my side. And now I'm finally rid of him.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_318040010 leans on Thorns & Brambles across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: If she comes for you, do not think twice. You must flee.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_318042030 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Perhaps we will meet again, if fate permits.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_318043010 leans on Primeval Current across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I've sliced the finger off.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_318070020 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Do not stain the immaculacy of your sword, your flesh, your fire...

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_318070040 leans on Sacred Flame across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: You are about to sacrifice something precious.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_318081000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost and Martyrdom & Sacrifice across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Your ascendency requires her sacrifice, whether she wishes it or not.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_318081040 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost and Martyrdom & Sacrifice across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Seek audience with the Three Fingers, and the flame of frenzy.

quotes.text: If you inherit the flame of frenzy, your flesh will serve as kindling,

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_318083030 leans on Sacred Flame across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Seek audience with the Three Fingers, and the flame of frenzy.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_318084020 leans on Sacred Flame across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I had no choice.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_318803000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: What a wretched fate.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_318804000 leans on Primeval Current across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I'm known as D. I hunt down Those Who Live in Death, and weed their Deathroot.

quotes.text: But with a prowess for weeding Deathroot.

quotes.text: If you're inclined to hunt more of Those Who Live in Death, and weed their Deathroot,

quotes.text: With a prowess for weeding Deathroot.

quotes.text: If you're inclined to hunt more of Those Who Live in Death, and weed their Deathroot,

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_319016050 leans on Roots & Veins across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: See the wrath of the Golden Order! The Order's justice, writ in blood!

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_319020010 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Look at this rotten whore. No more children can be got from this useless flesh!

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_319020040 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: The rotten witch is dead. The Golden Order, unsullied.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_319021010 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Now I can look my brother Darian in the eye.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_319021020 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I'm known as D. I hunt down Those Who Live in Death, and weed their Deathroot.

quotes.text: With a prowess for weeding Deathroot.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_319130030 leans on Roots & Veins across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: If you're inclined to hunt more of Those Who Live in Death, and weed their Deathroot,

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_319130060 leans on Roots & Veins across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Ah, hello. You've been busy weeding Deathroot, I take it.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_319143000 leans on Roots & Veins across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I thank you, as your brother-in-arms.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_319143010 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Killing Those Who Live in Death and weeding their Deathroot...

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_319145010 leans on Roots & Veins across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: You see him now, ravaged by thorns, muttering and rambling...

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_319151050 leans on Thorns & Brambles across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: When grace is sullied, it rots people from the inside. Breaks them.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_319151090 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: A defiler of the Golden Order, and murderer of my brother!

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_319811020 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I'll grind your corpse into that vile wench's rotting remains.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_319811040 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: You defiled cretin. My brother is now avenged!

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_319812000 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: And heading to Stormveil Castle?

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_320002010 leans on Storm & Tempest across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Enticed by the one in the white mask, I suppose. Oh, you've come to be one with the spider?

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_320002020 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost and Trickster & Mask across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Oh, can you pass on a message for me, if you see the little chrysalids in Stormveil Castle?

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_320005010 leans on Storm & Tempest across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Greetings. Nice to see you again.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_320030000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I never knew the guidance bestowed upon us Tarnished had such fantastic roots.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_320030040 leans on Roots & Veins across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I never knew the guidance bestowed upon us Tarnished had such fantastic roots.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_320034040 leans on Roots & Veins across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Roderika the spirit tuner prentice. Pleased to make your acquaintance.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_320040070 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Master Hewg said it himself, actually, that I'm no mere prentice any longer.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_320051030 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I can't hear them any more; the voices of the spirits cowering from the curse...

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_320055000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: The voices of the tormented spirits are silent again..

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_320057000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: His roots are so knotted in this place.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_320060060 leans on Roots & Veins across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: It's only proper that we respect his choice to stay.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_320080050 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Hmph, yes, now allow me to furnish you with a little advice.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_321004000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: A Knight commander from Stormveil took it. A fool, and plumb mad to boot. Simply obsessed with blood!

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_321010070 leans on Storm & Tempest across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Would you like to enter my service?

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_321022010 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Enter into my service and learn the workings of the Erdtree's true Order.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_321022030 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Well...not that I can't sympathise with your choice.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_321024020 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Well...not that I can't sympathise with your choice.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_321026000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Oh, indeed, it is a foul fate for a land, to be without a ruler.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_321050020 leans on Primeval Current across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Ah, nice to see you after so long.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_321060000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: The blessing is still aflame in your breast, dear.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_322005020 leans on Sacred Flame across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: So it is, that any loathing, any hatred that overshadows them...

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_322041030 leans on Oaths & Vows across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I am the guardian of Those Who Live in Death.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_322043010 leans on Guardian & Threshold across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: They call me a foul and rotten witch.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_322043020 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: The rotten fools. My fate was the grandest, most brilliant of them all!

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_323041080 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity and Primeval Current across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Allow me a word of advice, as your senior.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_324002000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Do so, and the doors to the Roundtable's inner chamber will open.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_324011050 leans on Sap & Flow across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Godrick the Grafted, Lord of Stormveil.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_324021040 leans on Storm & Tempest across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: General Radahn, who fought Malenia and her rot to a standstill in the Caelid Wilds.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_324021050 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: So. Godrick the Grafted, Lord of Stormveil.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_324022000 leans on Storm & Tempest across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Despite being the blood of Godfrey, first Elden Lord, he's a grotesque old fool, grasping for power.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_324022010 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: He fought Malenia and her rot to a standstill in the Caelid Wilds to Limgrave's east.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_324023010 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: And now Caelid has been engulfed by the scarlet rot, even approaching the region is no mean feat.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_324023020 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I've heard survivors of Radahn's army are still in the wilds, staving off the rot with fire.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_324023030 leans on Sacred Flame and Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: She is merely the recipient of an amber egg, given to her by Radagon,

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_324026030 leans on Sap & Flow across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: The Great Rune dwells within the amber egg that was Radagon's gift to her.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_324026050 leans on Sap & Flow across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: His twin, Malenia, the undefeated swordswoman.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_324027020 leans on Twinship & Mirrors across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Make the journey.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_324032020 leans on Pilgrim & Journey across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Journey to the capital Leyndell, to the east of the Altus Plateau, at the foot of the Erdtree.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_324033000 leans on Pilgrim & Journey across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: He fought Malenia and her rot to a standstill in the Caelid Wilds to Limgrave's east.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_324035010 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Do not hesitate to employ her, should her services benefit you.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_324040050 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Bloody Seluvis. I suppose he's up to something again.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_324042010 leans on Trickster & Mask across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: You go and see Seluvis, but don't give anything away.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_324043010 leans on Trickster & Mask across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: allow me to tender some advice, in regard to the half of the secret medallion you possess.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_324051010 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: allow me to tender some advice, in regard to the half of the secret medallion you possess.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_324053010 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: To pass the impenetrable thorns, you seek the forge of the flame of ruin, in the snowy mountaintops of the giants.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_324060010 leans on Thorns & Brambles and Sacred Flame across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: If you're heading to the forge of the flame of ruin, in the snowy mountaintops of the giants.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_324061000 leans on Sacred Flame across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Well, if the scarlet rot hasn't eaten her away completely.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_324071020 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: If he continues his slumber within the cocoon, all would be well.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_324076010 leans on Dream & Reverie across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Ah, nice to meet you.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_325001000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: But enough about me, what are you doing here in Stormveil Castle?

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_325001040 leans on Storm & Tempest across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: This place is bristling with Tarnished hunters, you know. They sacrifice our kind, for grafting.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_325001050 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost and Martyrdom & Sacrifice across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: The battle art you've learned is of the glintstone family.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_325005000 leans on Glintstone & Crystalline across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: That the Golden Order was pliable enough to absorb practices that contradicted itself in the past.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_325005040 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Watch you don't get sacrificed, eh. I'll do the same.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_325006030 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost and Martyrdom & Sacrifice across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Mm, looks like we both got we wanted out of Stormveil, didn't we.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_325021010 leans on Storm & Tempest across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: The misshapen corpse under Stormveil?

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_325022000 leans on Storm & Tempest across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I once wished to become a scholar, you see. I've spent many an hour scouring the archives for knowledge of that fateful plot.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_325022070 leans on Primeval Current across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: We found ourselves journeying together for a time, bound by our exploration of Death.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_325027020 leans on Pilgrim & Journey across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Though that's hardly an uncommon fate for two friends.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_325027040 leans on Primeval Current across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: If Ranni truly is the one who plotted that fateful night,

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_325030080 leans on Primeval Current across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: If Lunar Princess Ranni truly is the one who plotted that fateful night,

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_325032000 leans on Primeval Current across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: But, if she in her current form is nothing more than the living doll you profess...

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_325040030 leans on Primeval Current across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: And the best way to find out is for you to enter her service and take a poke around on the sly.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_325040100 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: While in her service, you'll be able to take a poke around on the sly.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_325041010 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Lately, I feel I'm on the precipice...

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_325046010 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Of falling into a deep...fathomless slumber.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_325046020 leans on Dream & Reverie across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Sorry. You were only trying to be nice.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_325102030 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: O Greater Will, hear my voice.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_326021000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I am the recusant Bernahl, inheritor of my brother's will, and you will fall to my blade.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_326021010 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I won't say it twice. Stop this.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_326800020 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I suppose I have no choice, then.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_326801000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I welcome you, to the Church of Vows.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_330001010 leans on Oaths & Vows across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I am Miriel, steward of this sacred chamber.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_330001020 leans on Sap & Flow across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: How it came to be known as the Church of Vows?

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_330001050 leans on Oaths & Vows across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: It is here, at the Church of Vows, that the great houses of the Erdtree and the Moon were joined.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_330002020 leans on Oaths & Vows across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Concerning the miracle of this Church of Vows.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_330011020 leans on Oaths & Vows across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: The Order of the Erdtree and the fate of the moon were conjoined, and all the wounds of war forgiven.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_330011050 leans on Primeval Current across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: The miracle rooted in these grounds will, once again, mend the world.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_330012010 leans on Roots & Veins across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: As the priest of the Church of Vows, I undo the sword's seal, and bequeath it unto you.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_330014070 leans on Oaths & Vows across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Allow me to introduce myself. Miriel, steward of this sacred chamber.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_330021020 leans on Sap & Flow across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: How it came to be known as the Church of Vows?

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_330021050 leans on Oaths & Vows across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: In the end, Lady Rennala was left alone, cradling the amber egg Lord Radagon bequeathed her.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_330053000 leans on Sap & Flow across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Severing a vow, strongest of bonds, has consequences ever more dire.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_330053040 leans on Oaths & Vows across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Alright then. It's yours, if you can meet me price.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_331004030 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I ain't ever been more scared, neither. Rooted to the bloody spot...

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_331026030 leans on Roots & Veins across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I left the serpent-slaying spear in the Lord's Chamber.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_332002040 leans on Sap & Flow across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Worthy Tarnished. I left the serpent-slaying spear in the Lord's Chamber.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_332004000 leans on Sap & Flow across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Believe it or not, I studied glintstone sorceries at the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_333001020 leans on Glintstone & Crystalline across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Believe it or not, I studied glintstone sorceries at the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_333006020 leans on Glintstone & Crystalline across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: That's the Academy of Raya Lucaria. Where we study glintstone sorceries.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_333020050 leans on Glintstone & Crystalline across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: making entry to the academy impossible without a glintstone key.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_333020110 leans on Glintstone & Crystalline across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: When they cast the seals, I'd just popped out, and now I'm uprooted from my place of learning.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_333020130 leans on Roots & Veins across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Why not find yourself a glintstone key?

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_333021000 leans on Glintstone & Crystalline across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: And if you find an extra glintstone key, perhaps...

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_333021030 leans on Glintstone & Crystalline across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: You're willing to give your glintstone key to me?

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_333024010 leans on Glintstone & Crystalline across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: To resume my study...of glintstone sorceries, and the very stars.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_333024050 leans on Glintstone & Crystalline across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: You've taken an apprenticeship with Sellen?

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_333025000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Find yourself a glintstone key.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_333026000 leans on Glintstone & Crystalline across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: So, you've found yourself a glintstone key.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_333040000 leans on Glintstone & Crystalline across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Carry on with your journey. Press forward with your fight.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_333041010 leans on Pilgrim & Journey across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Your only mistake was your choice of master.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_334001010 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Nepheli Loux. We met at Stormveil.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_334010020 leans on Storm & Tempest across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Nepheli Loux. We met at Stormveil.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_334010100 leans on Storm & Tempest across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I'll see you again, warrior, should the fates deign it.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_334012010 leans on Primeval Current across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Nepheli Loux. We met at Stormveil.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_334018020 leans on Storm & Tempest across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: And though the suffering cannot be undone, I can still mete out justice.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_334031010 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Justice to the oppressors.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_334031020 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Where is the justice he purports, in that?

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_334042020 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I can smell the ancient storm in it...

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_334060010 leans on Storm & Tempest across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: In this ash, I can smell the ancient storm.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_334062000 leans on Storm & Tempest across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I remembered the vow I took when I first became a warrior, so many moons ago.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_334070030 leans on Oaths & Vows across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I will call upon the storm, to drive away the foulness that has settled on the winds.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_334070050 leans on Storm & Tempest across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I will remain, to summon the storm.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_334072010 leans on Storm & Tempest across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I will remain, to summon the storm.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_334073000 leans on Storm & Tempest across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Perhaps you've heard of dreambrew, the nectar of the demigods, once forbidden to we mortals?

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_335001030 leans on Dream & Reverie across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: That, is St. Trina's Crystal Ball.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_335002030 leans on Glintstone & Crystalline across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: It can be used to take slumber fog from those submerged in deepest sleep,

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_335002040 leans on Dream & Reverie across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Dreambrew, I should say, is a special filtration of slumber fog.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_335002060 leans on Dream & Reverie across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Go ahead and bring me some slumber fog, my compeer.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_335003000 leans on Dream & Reverie across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: And then I'll have enough dreambrew to share.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_335003060 leans on Dream & Reverie across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Like dreambrew, the nectar of the demigods, once forbidden to we mortals?

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_335005010 leans on Dream & Reverie across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: How did you fare? Find any slumber fog?

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_335010010 leans on Dream & Reverie across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: As I said, if you'd like me to share some dreambrew with you, we'll need two doses of slumber fog, or thereabouts.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_335011010 leans on Dream & Reverie across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: As I said, if you'd like me to share some dreambrew with you, we'll need three doses of slumber fog, or thereabouts.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_335011020 leans on Dream & Reverie across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: As I said, if you'd like me to share some dreambrew with you, we'll need four doses of slumber fog, or thereabouts.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_335011030 leans on Dream & Reverie across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: As I said, if you'd like me to share some dreambrew with you, we'll need five doses of slumber fog, or thereabouts.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_335011040 leans on Dream & Reverie across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: As I said, if you'd like me to share some dreambrew with you, we'll need six doses of slumber fog, or thereabouts.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_335011050 leans on Dream & Reverie across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Here's the dreambrew I promised. All yours.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_335012030 leans on Dream & Reverie across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Bring me more slumber fog, my compeer.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_335013000 leans on Dream & Reverie across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Do so, and I'll have a bottle of dreambrew with your name on it.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_335013010 leans on Dream & Reverie across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Allow me a little advice, my compeer.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_335014000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Dreambrew is known to drag people's secrets into the daylight.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_335014010 leans on Dream & Reverie across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Then treat them to some dreambrew.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_335014030 leans on Dream & Reverie across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Have you brought me some more slumber fog?

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_335016010 leans on Dream & Reverie across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: So I forced these old bones to weather the journey.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_335030020 leans on Pilgrim & Journey across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: The abductor's bloody footprints are said to have disappeared in the Forest of Ancient Bowers.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_335040020 leans on Sap & Flow across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: The abductor's bloody footprints are said to have disappeared in the Forest of Ancient Bowers.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_335041020 leans on Sap & Flow across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Into your dream, the world of your heart.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_335050050 leans on Dream & Reverie across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Into your dream, the world of your heart.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_335051030 leans on Dream & Reverie across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I didn't notice that you were Tarnished.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_337002010 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: the traitors were eyed by the grotesque Fell Omen, and their corpses piled high outside the wall!

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_337003090 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Well, you've done us a fine service, I must say.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_337030030 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: My flesh writhes with scarlet rot.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_348002020 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: My flesh writhes with scarlet rot.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_348003010 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: To quell the scarlet rot?

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_348010010 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Everything is as you said. Since inserting the needle, the scarlet rot has ceased to writhe.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_348020020 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I'm considering leaving. On a journey.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_348021000 leans on Pilgrim & Journey across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: My name is Millicent. I pray fate permits us meet again.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_348021040 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost and Primeval Current across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I'm considering leaving. On a journey.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_348022000 leans on Pilgrim & Journey across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I must focus on my journey, for which I have you to thank.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_348026010 leans on Pilgrim & Journey across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: The scarlet rot has stilled, since last we met.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_348030020 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: As such, I've been able to continue my journey.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_348030030 leans on Pilgrim & Journey across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: after unleashing the power of the scarlet rot, during her battle with General Radahn, in the Caelid Wilds.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_348031010 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: The dignity, the sense of self, that allowed her to resist the call of the scarlet rot.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_348061020 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: The dignity, the sense of self, that allowed her to resist the call of the scarlet rot.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_348062020 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I would rather rot into nothingness as I am.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_348071050 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: The scarlet rot writhes now, worse than ever.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_348072010 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: A strapping young Tarnished, able to cross the scarlet swamp of Aeonia.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349001030 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Her name is Millicent. You will find her beyond Sellia,

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349010020 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: resting at the church atop the cliff, stricken by the rotting sickness.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349010030 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: The rotting sickness that afflicts Millicent has no cure.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349011000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost and Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: But Millicent's suffering can be ameliorated.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349011020 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Seek the deep scarlet swamp of Aeonia, outside Sellia's bounds.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349011040 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: It's hidden somewhere in the deep scarlet swamp of Aeonia.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349012010 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: The needle is repaired. Now it will forestall the rotting sickness, I'm sure.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349021010 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Will you give it to the girl, Millicent?

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349021020 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Millicent rests at the church atop the cliff, beyond Sellia, the town yonder.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349021040 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Tended to by the witless pests who worship her, or rather, her rotting sickness, as a god.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349021050 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: A wretched fate, indeed. The poor girl, she never wished for any of this.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349021060 leans on Primeval Current across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: But the rotting sickness erodes one's memory.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349022050 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Now, all you need do is deliver the needle to Millicent.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349027000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: For giving the needle to Millicent.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349030010 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Now she, too, can begin her journey.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349030020 leans on Pilgrim & Journey across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: And stare her fate straight in the eye.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349030030 leans on Primeval Current across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: As thanks, I vow to impart to you my knowledge

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349030050 leans on Oaths & Vows across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Please make certain that little Millicent goes unharmed.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349031000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Oh, you noticed, did you?

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349032000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Indeed, Millicent did visit this hovel of a home.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349032010 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: It seems the memories eaten away by the rotting sickness yet remain, but faintly.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349032020 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: No, she must embark on her journey, and stare her fate in the eye. I mustn't impede.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349032040 leans on Lichen & Bark, Primeval Current and Pilgrim & Journey across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: So, you gave Millicent a golden arm replacementâ€¦

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349040000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Now Millicent may fully realise her true warrior's potential.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349040030 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: The girl, Millicent. She is a bud.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349041000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Green and undeveloped, waiting to flower into magnificence.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349041010 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Do you have an interest in rot incantations?

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349050000 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: of Malenia, goddess of scarlet rot.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349050020 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Queen Marika and her King Consort Radagon were blessed with twin demigods, and Malenia was one of them.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349051000 leans on Twinship & Mirrors across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: She was born an Empyrean, carrying the scarlet rot.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349051010 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Since Malenia fought Radahn, and the great scarlet flower blossomed in Aeonia, I have dedicated myself to her.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349051050 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: And to the resplendence of the Order of Rot. The cycle of decay and rebirth.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349051060 leans on Rebirth & Cycles and Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Oh, Millicent. Finding herself, is she?

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349060000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Little Millicent, following in the steps of her mother, no matter what.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349060030 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: This is their fate, after all.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349060040 leans on Primeval Current across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Oh, mm, I didn't notice you there.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349071000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I realised that I'd soon be saying my goodbyes to Millicent, andâ€¦

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349072010 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I ask that you side with the sisters and kill Millicent.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349072070 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Millicent trusts you, rather deeply in fact.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349072090 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Sever that trust. Nurtured by betrayal, her bud will flower most vividly.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349072100 leans on Betrayal & Fracture across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: When Malenia ascends to godhood, Millicent too shall be reborn.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349072110 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: As a scarlet valkyrie.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349072120 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I beg you, kill Millicent.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349073010 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: You seem to have sown a seed in Millicent's heart.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349073040 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Malenia will be a goddess. And once she is, Millicent will flower anew, as a scarlet valkyrie.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349073060 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost and Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: The superior bud that is Millicent, becoming the finest of flowers?

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349074010 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Oh how I have counted the days. Millicent shall soon meet her sisters.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349075010 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Do what you must to ensure Millicent dies.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349076010 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Millicent, my daughter.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349076030 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: We children of the scarlet rot?

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349076070 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Millicent...

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349078000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: O Millicent, my daughter...

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349080050 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Who would prune your sapling flesh?

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349080060 leans on Sap & Flow across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Oh, Millicent...

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_349101000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Do you know of the noble Goldmask?

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_351015020 leans on Trickster & Mask across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: As I mentioned, I'm off in search of the noble Goldmask.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_351020020 leans on Trickster & Mask across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I'm off in search of a noble scholar known as the Goldmask, to beg his instruction.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_351021020 leans on Trickster & Mask across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I'm yet to find the noble Goldmask.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_351035000 leans on Trickster & Mask across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: From your description, it can be no other than the Goldmask himself!

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_351036010 leans on Trickster & Mask across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: I will soon leave to join the noble Goldmask.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_351037000 leans on Trickster & Mask across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Thanks to you, I have become acquainted with the noble Goldmask himself,

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_351040010 leans on Trickster & Mask across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Oh, was that you? Sorry, I hardly noticed.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_351047000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Ah, nice to see you.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_351060000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Ah, nice to see you.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_351062000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: why would he think to breach this forbidden mount of fire?

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_351065090 leans on Sacred Flame across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Have patience. Until the time comes...and the roots call to you.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_700001010 leans on Roots & Veins across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: O Sapling! Sweet sapling of glorious gold.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_700020000 leans on Sap & Flow across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Has your crystal teardrop ripened?

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_700020010 leans on Glintstone & Crystalline across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: The demi-humans wax wroth, now their mother's been taken...

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_700040000 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Then where is he? Our true Lord, our Lord of Frenzied Flame.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_701010020 leans on Sacred Flame across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Love...revenge...the frenzied flame melts it all away...

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_701080010 leans on Sacred Flame across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Your splendid blade, dancing amongst the scarlet rot.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_703020020 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: It's rotting.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_703040010 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Everything, rotting scarlet.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_703040020 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Mohg, you rotten Omen. Your blood is cursed.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_704040010 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Tall and unwavering, mindless of the scorch of the flame of ruin.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_706001020 leans on Sacred Flame across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Nor the rank malformed twins.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_730000125 leans on Twinship & Mirrors across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: We are your guardians.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_736000130 leans on Guardian & Threshold across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: We swat at flies, snuff out flame,

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_736000140 leans on Sacred Flame across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Blessed we, at your side, on this journey.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_736000170 leans on Pilgrim & Journey across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Feral flame of Agheel, burn true...

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_743000110 leans on Sacred Flame across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: We journey on a road so far,

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_743000210 leans on Pilgrim & Journey across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: <Pathetic nonverbal wail when he suddenly notices a stranger nearby>

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_743000320 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: We are your guardians.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_743000430 leans on Guardian & Threshold across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: We swat at flies, snuff out flame,

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_743000440 leans on Sacred Flame across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Blessed we, at your side, on this journey.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_743000470 leans on Pilgrim & Journey across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Good-bye. Nice to do business.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_800006000 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: You've made an excellent choice.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_800009010 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: My people, wanderers all, have long been spurned by the grace of gold.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_800010020 leans on Pilgrim & Journey across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Which is why we cannot settle, but instead are forced into this pitiful, unceasing journey.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_800010030 leans on Pilgrim & Journey across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: My people are wanderers all, which I won't deny is one reason...

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_800011020 leans on Pilgrim & Journey across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: We have a saying, we wanderers.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_800012020 leans on Pilgrim & Journey across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: And I'm sure it's come from wherever the Great Caravan disappeared to.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_800034020 leans on Sap & Flow across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: My roots.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_800036030 leans on Roots & Veins across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Well, the journey can wait, I suppose.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_800051040 leans on Pilgrim & Journey across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: You've inherited the flame of frenzy!

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_800058030 leans on Sacred Flame across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: The yellow flame of chaos...

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_800058060 leans on Sacred Flame across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: The yellow flame of chaos...

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_800059020 leans on Sacred Flame across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Please, bestow unto me the yellow flame of chaos.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_800070010 leans on Sacred Flame across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: A frenzied flame to melt away the curses, suffering, and despair. And the Order, entire.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_800070020 leans on Sacred Flame across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: The frenzied flame...burned me...

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_800071000 leans on Sacred Flame across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: The frenzied flame...burned me...

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_800072000 leans on Sacred Flame across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: By the frenzied flame...of chaos...

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_800814010 leans on Sacred Flame across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: How nice of you to stop by, again.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_801003010 leans on Frost & Hoarfrost across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Have a safe journey.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_801303000 leans on Pilgrim & Journey across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Stay away, Us wanderers have had enough.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_801812000 leans on Pilgrim & Journey across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Rotten scoundrels...

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_801853000 leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity across 1 lore lines.

quotes.text: Of the swiftness of a wanderer's fury.

summaries.summary_text: npc:carian_speaker_801863010 leans on Pilgrim & Journey across 1 lore lines.
